pageSubtitle: Invest in projects building the future of Persian heritage
tokenGateDescription: Access to ventures requires holding at least 1M liquid PARS tokens. This ensures aligned incentives between investors and the protocol.
partnerDescription: Join our network of strategic partners supporting Persian cultural initiatives, humanitarian aid, and community projects worldwide.
investDescription: Deposit assets to acquire discounted PARS governance tokens through our OHM-inspired bonding mechanism. Build protocol-owned liquidity.
